short_summary: Renaturalize abandoned road, Forillon National Park, 5.9 km
description: The project aims to renaturalize the vast majority of the 5.9 kilometers of abandoned road to reconnect the forest and aquatic environments located on either side of this former road corridor.
full_summary:
## **Solicitation Notice**
###  **Reference Number**
5P468-23-0285/A-001

### **Publication Date**
April 9, 2024
### **Tender Closing Date**
April 25, 2024 2:00 PM
### **Description**

This solicitation is for the Stage 2 road restoration project, spanning 5.9 kilometers within Forillon National Park. The successful contractor will be responsible for renaturing a vast majority of the roadway, reconnecting forest and aquatic environments.

### **Background**

This is a two-stage selection process. In Stage 1, suppliers were evaluated based on their qualifications. In Stage 2, eligible suppliers were invited to provide a financial bid.

### **Project Requirements**
- **Location**: Forillon National Park, Quebec, Canada (except National Capital Region)
- **Scope**: Renature a 5.9 km section of an abandoned roadway
- **Start Date**: March 29, 2024
- **End Date**: May 15, 2025

### **Purchase Information**
- **Procurement Category**: CNST (Construction)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Traditional
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **GSAIN/UNSPSC**: *Environmental rehabilitation (77111600)

### **Solicitation Status**
This solicitation has expired and is no longer accepting bids.

### **Contact**
For further information and clarification on this solicitation, please contact
- **Name**: Cloë Pelland Tessier
- **Email**: [cloe.pelland-tessier@pc.gc.ca](mailto:cloe.pelland-tessier@pc.gc.ca) 
- **Phone**: (418) 928-7252
- **Fax**: (855) 983-1808
